title: MSC - number of ships 2020
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Ship Type, and Number of ships in each Ship Type on the y axis.
The Number of ships is appeared to be the highest at Ship Type Chartered and lowest at Ship Type Orderbook.
The difference of Number of ships between the highest and lowest Ship Type is 384.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of ships for 3 number of Ship Types.
The Number of ships is highest at Ship Type Chartered and lowest at Ship Type Orderbook.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Ship Type, and Number of ships in each Ship Type on the y axis.
The Number of ships is appeared to be the highest at Ship Type Chartered and lowest at Ship Type Orderbook.
The difference of Number of ships between the highest and lowest Ship Type is 384.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
Ship Type Chartered has the highest Number of ships and Orderbook has the lowest Number of ships.
The second highest Number of ships is appeared to be the Ship Type .
The highest Ship Type Chartered has 384.0 more Number of ships than the lowest Ship Type Orderbook.
Considered together, the average Number of ships in all 3 Ship Types is roughly 195.67.
The Number of ships is 587.0 if we add up values of all Ship Types.
